section.title: DevStack installation
section.paragraph: Add the following lines in your local.conf file to enable CloudKitty with the ceilometer collector:
section.literal_block:
[[local|localrc]] # ceilometer enable_plugin ceilometer https://git.openstack.org/openstack/ceilometer.git master
# horizon enable_service horizon
# cloudkitty enable_plugin cloudkitty https://git.openstack.org/openstack/cloudkitty.git master enable_service ck-api ck-proc CLOUDKITTY_COLLECTOR=ceilometer
section.paragraph: To enable the gnocchi collector, use the following instead:
section.literal_block:
[[local|localrc]] # gnocchi enable_plugin gnocchi https://github.com/openstack/gnocchi master enable_service gnocchi-api,gnocchi-metricd
# ceilometer enable_plugin ceilometer https://git.openstack.org/openstack/ceilometer.git master
# horizon enable_service horizon
# cloudkitty enable_plugin cloudkitty https://git.openstack.org/openstack/cloudkitty.git master enable_service ck-api ck-proc CLOUDKITTY_COLLECTOR=gnocchi
